additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 200 health, 1 health regen, 1.67 armor, 10 attack speed, 120 mana, 0.5 mana regen and 10 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 200 health, 1 health regen, 1.67 armor, 10 attack speed, 120 mana, 0.5 mana regen and 10 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 200 health, 1 health regen, 1.67 armor, 10 attack speed, 120 mana, 0.5 mana regen and 10 attack damage.
name: Ultimate Orb
description: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.
